# QSPthemes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of QSPthemes is to have all the ggplot2 themes used in the Quantitative Sciences Program in one easily accessible place.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dougtommet/QSPthemes")
```
